name: Together (itch) (IAMMRWAYNE)
description:
Trapped in box and both players must use their abilities to get through

This is a Couch co-op game, you must have two controllers to play

You can Only play this with with controllers!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Made for Global Start Up Cities Game Jam

Could not refine the project cause of the present state of electricity in my country.

the idea of the game is that two players have different abilities which can pop up in different levels and have to use both abilities to solve puzzles and get through enemies, i hope the small prototype gets the point across.

All enemies in the current game state are procedural and that as is the plan for each enemy type

R1 to shoot

L1 to use abilities

Analog to move and aim
